pr_title: xds: no longer use existing Subchannels after xDS resource becomes unavailable

timeline.message: Shut down EDS downstream balancers when the watched EDS resource becomes unavailable.
Shut down CDS downstream balancers immediately when the watched CDS resource becomes unavailable.

timeline.bodyText: Need change the comment of the edsBalancer field.

timeline.bodyText: Also set edsBalancer = null at https://github.com/grpc/grpc-java/pull/7081/files#diff-78c989ecc725727447eb9aaf38e31055R182 to avoid edsBalancer double shutdown.
timeline.author: dapengzhang0
